Headline: #85 Central Temporary Northbound Reroute near Central/Agatite
ShortDescription: NB 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Montrose, Austin, Lawrence & Central, due to street blockage near Central/Agatite.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Montrose, Austin, Lawrence, then resume their normal route on Central, due to street blockage near Central/Agatite.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
